text: Metro Exodus is a horror first-person shooter video game developed by 4A Games and published by Deep Silver. ==Other websites== * Category:2010s horror video games Category:2019 video games Category:First-person shooters Category:Linux games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Post- apocalyptic video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about cannibalism Category:Video games about nuclear war and weapons Category:Video games developed in Ukraine Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Metro Exodus
